data.title: Movies
data.meta_description: Posts about Movies written by astroradioz
data.text:
Daniel and Derrick return with the CRADLE OF FILTH horror anthology directed by Alex Chandon CRADLE OF FEAR this episode after a brief conversation they had last episode where this film came up. The two hadn’t seen the film for almost 20 years and wanted to see if it held up. Does it? Listen and…

Derrick, Vaughn, and Even return to cover more Andy Milligan films this episode. This time they tackle Milligan’s haunted house movie CARNAGE, his remake of THE GHASTLY ONES – LEGACY OF BLOOD, and his unfinished civil war drama available at bynwr.com HOUSE OF SEVEN BELLES. They also talk about a TV show that suddenly appeared…

Evan, Vaughn, and Derrick are back to talk about Andy Milligan’s gritty urban dramas, NIGHTBIRDS and FLESHPOT ON 42ND STREET. DOWNLOAD HERE The Bottom Rack with Daniel Edenfield of THE NIGHT KEEP/SEREGOST covers The Perfect Weapon!! SUPPORT DAN AND HIS MUSIC: The Night Keep: https://nightkeep.bandcamp.com/ Seregost: https://seregost.bandcamp.com/releases Welcome on our new contributor THE LURKING TRANSMISSION to Astro…

Welcome to the fourth FULL LENGTH episode of THE BOTTOM RACK, hosted by Astro Radio Z’s Daniel Edenfield!! Joined by Paul Salzer, Angelique Bone, and Mark the Movie Man, the four of them are looking to cruise the depths of low budget, mockbuster schlock this summer for your enjoyment. Our Final Mockbuster Summer 2019 episode…

Check out the preview of the full blown, full length summer mockbuster summer series that The Bottom Rack’s DANIEL EDENFIELD is running here on ASTRO RADIO Z!!! Dan lays out what you are gonna hear in the coming month from this series. Download here SUPPORT DAN AND HIS MUSIC: The Night Keep: https://nightkeep.bandcamp.com/ Seregost: https://seregost.bandcamp.com/releases CONTACT AND…

ARZ is back to the SOV well with our bud Eric this episode and special guests Amy and Rich. We dig head first into the hilariously awful world of Nick Millard and his “powerhouse action thriller” full of nipple licking and gun sound effects, GUNBLAST!! DOWNLOAD HERE That Wrestling Gimmick returns with another part of…

Derrick, Vaughn of the MOTION PICTURE MASSACRE Podcast, , and Evan are back to continue the Directors Series on Andy Milligan this episode with GURU, THE MAD MONK, BLOODTHIRSTY BUTCHERS, and the ARZ infamous THE RATS ARE COMING, THE WEREWOLVES ARE HERE! This will be the most difficult episode in our retrospective by far. Will the void…

Derrick, Vaughn of the MOTION PICTURE MASSACRE Podcast, and Evan are back to continue the Directors Series on Andy Milligan this episode with THE GHASTLY ONES (1968) and TORTURE DUNGEON (1970)! Milligan jumps to color this time and we stand aghast at it’s putrescence. DOWNLOAD HERE Stillborn Goat decides to mix it up and give you…

CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD AND LISTEN TO THE SHOW ARZ is back in full swing, and by that we mean that Derrick is going back to the SHOT ON VIDEO well with his new co-host on this series, Eric Stenglein of the band NORTHLESS. We meet Eric, get his history, and then jump into his first…

ASTRO RADIO Z REBORN!! CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD AND LISTEN TO THE SHOW Welcome to the first episode of 2019 and the new ARZ. We come back with the first of a series of episodes about cult filmmaker Andy Milligan. Vaughn, of the MOTION PICTURE MASSACRE Podcast, and Evan come on to join Derrick in…

We are back for our final installment of the American Ninja series. This episode we cover American Ninja 5. CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD AND LISTEN TO THE EPISODE CONTACT AND FOLLOW ASTRO RADIO Z: Contact: astroradiozpodcast@gmail.com Website: www.astroradioz.com Tumblr: astroradioz.tumblr.com Twitter: @AstroRadioZ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AstroRadioZ Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/astroradioz HOLE IN THE WALL IS NOW AVAILABLE TO VIEW FREE FOR AMAZON PRIME MEMBERS!…

We warned you it was coming. We watched all three new Witchcraft movies. Prepare yourselves while Derrick, Glenn, Mark the Movie man, Scott, Brian, and witchcraft super fan Dustin Hubbard go through parts 14-16 in far more detail than anyone is likely to ever give. 3 hours of Witchcraft finger power nonsense. Enjoy if you…
